body:
You can view your Test candidates listed under the Candidates tab of a Test. For a particular Test, this tab lists the entries for all the candidates you have invited and those who are at different stages of the Test, which includes "To evaluate", "In progress", etc.

To view the list of all Test candidates:

  1. On the HackerRank homepage, navigate to Tests and select the required Test.

The Tests homepage
  1. Click the Candidates tab to view the list of all the candidates you have invited to take this test, as shown in the illustration below. You can use the options in the left pane to filter specific candidate entries.

The 'Candidates' tab of a Test

From the Candidates tab, you can view and manage the candidate entries, their Test performance reports, and your evaluations.

Refer to the following topics for more related information:

  1. Filtering and sorting reports
  2. Viewing a Candidate's Detailed Test Report
  3. Downloading PDF and Excel Test Reports

Â
title: Where can I view the list of Test Candidates?
